Price: $16.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:29:18 UTC – Details)



MEDIUM SIZE SET: Fast sling puck game is a game that both children and adults can play. Medium size table game toy is more for children over 6 years old. The rules are simple, just use the rubber band to bounce the chess you own through the goal to reach the opponent’s area, and you are the winner if you hit all the chess pieces first. (SIZE: 14*9*1.2 in)
DEVELOP CHILDREN’S ABILITIES: Sling puck game is a fast-paced game. It can improve children’s concentration, hand-eye coordination and rapid response ability in fast and concentrated hits, and can keep children away from video games temporarily. This slingshot game toy can also enhance a child’s sense of competition.
HIGH QUALITY SOLID WOODEN: Wooden hockey table game toy use high-quality solid wood frames to make chess pieces and chessboards, which are durable and smooth. The surface is smooth and will not hurt the player’s hands. It can also make the chess pieces slide more smoothly. The chessboard adopts professional tenon and tenon structure can make it stronger.
FAMILY FUN OR PARTY GAME: As a desktop battle board game toy pursuing speed, it is suitable for colleague dinners, friends gathering, family entertainment, can promote colleague relations, enhance parent-child interaction which is an active atmosphere toy. Let us enjoy a relaxing leisure time with family and friends!
IDEAL GIFT FOR KIDS & ADULTS: Wooden sling hockey board game is a toy for all ages. Table game toy is made of wood, adhering to the concept of environmental protection and recyclability, without batteries. It can be used as a child’s birthday gift or as a holiday gift. Package includes: 1 chess board, 10 chess pieces, Christmas special edition box!

4.5
Price: $16.99

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $26.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 01:02:24 UTC – Details)

Product Description

How to play the fast sling puck game?

Each player has five pucks on their side. Now, who’s going to go first to make a move? You can decide this on your own or flip a coin to decide. The winner of the toss will go and make the first move. Players place a puck on the elastic band and try to slingshot the pucks through the hole in the middle to the other side. This exciting, fast-paced game will come to an end when one player cleared all his pucks on the board. Players are allowed to use only one of their hands to grab and push the pucks on the other side.

Perfect Gift

A great game makes a great gift. The sling puck game can be a perfect gift for Easter, Thanksgiving, and Christmas. The neat size of the game is portable and can be taken along with to bar, camping, etc.

Package Specification: 1 x Box 1 x Puck board 10 x Pucks

Sling Puck Game

Sling puck is a fast-paced game where two players compete by firing pucks to the opponents’ side. The first player with no pucks on his side wins. During the exciting game night, the sling puck game helps you unwind after work.

Premium Solid Wood

The chunky pucks made of solid wood are sturdy and well-crafted. With burr-free wood enhances smooth touch while playing. The Coogam sling puck game will soothe your daily stress and make for laughter.

Lighten Your Tension

While it’s a two-player game, it can be even funnier when playing with families and friends watching on the side. They will cheer for their favorite player as if they were watching a real competitive game; scream gladly for the winner.

Premium Solid Wood: High-quality sling puck board games are made of sturdy wood, long-lasting material that is thick and firm for multiple plays. The two puck firing strings are made of strong and durable elastic.
Eye-catching Design: Exquisitely made bright pucks contrast an attractive grass football field presents visual impact to your kids. Sharpen your child’s focus while gaining quicker responses in this fast-paced game. A pretty engaging board game that will keep them play for hours away from electronics.
Family Fun Time: This is a great board game for parents-kids to bond over. The Coogam sling puck board game offers an opportunity to develop social skills and intelligence. Kids get to improve their relationships with parents and friends while having a lot of fun out of it.
Soothe Your Anxiety: Without complicated rules, the sling puck board gameplay simply by ejecting the pucks through to the other side, a perfect game for hand-eye coordination practice as well as relaxation.
Screen-Free Activity: Still struggling to find the balance between digital and real-life connections? Coogam sling puck board game provides a screen-free quality time for kids and family, as a gift for boys and girls, or to have fun at parties.

How to play the fast sling puck game?

The winner of the toss will go and make the first move. Players place a puck on the elastic band and try to slingshot the pucks through the hole in the middle to the other side. This exciting, fast-paced game will come to an end when one player cleared all his pucks on the board. Players are allowed to use only one of their hands to grab and push the pucks on the other side.
